code: import React from"react";import Profile from"./Profile";import image from"../images/defaultAvatar.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CardPreview(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"maincontainer1__profilecard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"maincontainer1__text js-headerpreview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"maincontainer1__title js-name",children:props.name||"Nombre apellido"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"maincontainer1__subtitle js-job",children:props.job||"Front-end developer"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"maincontainer1__img js__profile-preview js__border-palette",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(image,")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"maincontainer1__links-container js-footerpreview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"tel:".concat(props.phone),className:"maincontainer1__links js-telefono js__link__radius",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-mobile-alt js__link__pallete"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"mailto:".concat(props.email),className:"maincontainer1__links js-mail js__link__radius",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-envelope js__link__pallete"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/".concat(props.linkedin),className:"maincontainer1__links js-linkedin js__link__radius",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-linkedin-in js__link__pallete"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://github.com/".concat(props.github),className:"maincontainer1__links js-git js__link__radius",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-github-alt js__link__pallete"})})]})]})});}export default CardPreview;
